column6: Legendary X-Scribe Chris Claremont and the dynamic Jonboy Meyers bring us tales of this all-new generation of X-Heroes! The lives of the GeNext youngsters have been changed forever! Struggling to adapt to these strange new changes, a familiar X-man with family ties to our young heroes storms in to rescue them from a dangerous mystical enemy. Want to find out who we're talking about? Guest starring...well, take a look at the cover, and you tell me!  Rated A ...$3.99
column8: | colorist:Jim Charalampidis | colorist:Alex Garner | writer:Chris Claremont | letterer:Ed Dukeshire | inker:Jonboy Meyers
